name: part_008
file: tmp_【 重大告知あり‼ 】#鷹嶺ルイ2周年LIVE 『ANIMAL』【3D LIVE】 [oU85vmx7jn8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Takane Lui, Ookami Mio, Shirakami Fubuki, Murasaki Shion, and La+ Darknesss finish their performance of 'RAD DOGS'.
A visual transition featuring cherry blossoms and roses leading into the next song.
Takane Lui and La+ Darknesss perform the song 'Cat Loving'.
scenes.song_name: キャットラビング (Cat Loving)

scenes.description: MC section where Takane Lui and La+ Darknesss talk about their performance and their 2nd anniversary.

subtitles.original: キャットラビング
subtitles.english: Cat Loving

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲/ 香椎モイミ
subtitles.english: Music & Lyrics / Moimi Kashii

subtitles.original: 痛いことは嫌いですが 君の手のひらは嫌いじゃない
subtitles.english: I don't like things that hurt, but I don't hate your palms.

subtitles.original: 言葉は飴玉みたいに 甘く広がって心満たせ
subtitles.english: Let words spread like candy, sweet and filling my heart.

subtitles.original: あー全然分かってない
subtitles.english: Ah, you don't understand at all.

subtitles.original: 永遠に言う通り
subtitles.english: Forever doing as I'm told.

subtitles.original: 完全にフェアじゃない
subtitles.english: It's completely unfair.

subtitles.original: (どこにいても) あー何で？は聞いていない
subtitles.english: (No matter where I am) Ah, "Why?" doesn't work.

subtitles.original: もっともっとあの子みたいに 可愛くならなくちゃ
subtitles.english: I have to become cuter and cuter, just like that girl.

subtitles.original: 愛情は染めに 宿命はHow many?
subtitles.english: Affection is in the dyeing, fate is... How many?

subtitles.original: もう一体誰のだって分かんなくなる
subtitles.english: I can't even tell whose it is anymore.

subtitles.original: 延命またたび 週に二ご褒美
subtitles.english: Life-prolonging catnip, a reward twice a week.

subtitles.original: 「もう嫌んなった」って離されないように
subtitles.english: So I won't be let go of even if I say "I'm sick of this."

subtitles.original: 今日だってちゃんとお膝で ほんと内緒の手繕い
subtitles.english: Today too, properly on your lap, a truly secret grooming.

subtitles.original: にゃんって良い子にするから愛して
subtitles.english: I'll be a good girl and go "Meow", so love me.

subtitles.original: Everybody Today is a rubbing day. Get in Get in this is my catnip.
subtitles.english: Everybody Today is a rubbing day. Get in Get in this is my catnip.

subtitles.original: Any Any Any time is fine. Gimme Gimme Run with me my darling.
subtitles.english: Any Any Any time is fine. Gimme Gimme Run with me my darling.

subtitles.original: 会いたいを間違いなんて皆は言う 取り憑かれていって
subtitles.english: Everyone says wanting to see you is a mistake, being possessed.

subtitles.original: ならこの胸で疼く 締め付けるような切なさは何なの？
subtitles.english: Then what is this tightening sorrow aching in my chest?

subtitles.original: 選ぶ言葉
subtitles.english: The words I choose,

subtitles.original: 戸惑う指先
subtitles.english: My hesitant fingertips,

subtitles.original: 端正な横顔
subtitles.english: Your refined profile.

subtitles.original: (私しか知らない) あーランダムご機嫌
subtitles.english: (I'm the only one who knows) Ah, random moods.

subtitles.original: もしかして今日は
subtitles.english: Maybe today,

subtitles.original: 優しく撫でてくれるのかな
subtitles.english: You'll pet me gently.

subtitles.original: 君のそれか耐えられるの 生涯で私だけなんだよね
subtitles.english: I'm the only one in the world who can endure you like this.

subtitles.original: あからさまにカラダまさに 「もう嫌だ」って離れられないよね そうだよね？
subtitles.english: Obviously, my body literally can't leave even if I say "Enough." Right?

subtitles.original: 感情は徐々に 歌声は少々に
subtitles.english: Emotions gradually, vocals just a little.

subtitles.original: 漏れも冴えるように 転がせば良い
subtitles.english: Just let them roll so even leaks are crisp.

subtitles.original: 柑橘の匂い 立て凌ぐのだ
subtitles.english: The smell of citrus, I'll endure it.

subtitles.original: もう勝手しか言われぬだけだし
subtitles.english: It's not like I can do anything but obey.

subtitles.original: 今日だってちゃんとお膝で 大人しく
subtitles.english: Today too, properly on your lap, behaving.

subtitles.original: にゃんってお好きなように 完全淘汰して
subtitles.english: Meowing as you please, completely eliminating me.

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Congratulations!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Congratulations! Congratulations!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！一緒だよ！
subtitles.english: Congratulations! We're together!

subtitles.original: ということでね 今日、そうそうそう今日
subtitles.english: And so, today, yes, yes, yes, today.

subtitles.original: ということで あの、泥犬と そして我々で2曲連続で出ていただきまして
subtitles.english: So, we had RAD DOGS and then us perform two songs in a row.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: いやーどうですか？
subtitles.english: So, how was it?

subtitles.original: 実はね、うちら2周年にして 2人で歌うのは初めて
subtitles.english: Actually, even though it's our 2nd anniversary, this is the first time we've sung as a duo.

subtitles.original: いやそれ！
subtitles.english: Exactly that!

subtitles.original: いやそれな！ 何そのテンション
subtitles.english: Yeah, that! What's with that energy?

subtitles.original: いやそれな！ そう 今日はとっても嬉しい日なのでテンション高いですけれど
subtitles.english: Yeah, that! Right, today is a very happy day, so I'm really hyped.

subtitles.original: やっぱりさ ホロックスでデビューしてさ 最初うちらだったじゃん、デビューしたのが
subtitles.english: After all, when we debuted in HoloX, we were the first ones to debut.

subtitles.original: 総帥・幹部で出てきて 結構みんなからのこうね、あの注目もあって
subtitles.english: Coming out as the Leader and Executive, we got quite a lot of attention from everyone.

subtitles.original: で、色々2周年こう、駆け... こう、駆け... 走って、何て言うの？何て言えばいいの？
subtitles.english: And for these two years, we've been... been... running... what's the word? How should I say it?

subtitles.original: 駆け抜けてね！
subtitles.english: Dashing through!

subtitles.original: あ、そうそうそう！ 駆け抜けてきたね！ 今もうね、疲れで頭が...
subtitles.english: Ah, right, right! We've dashed through! My brain is just fried from exhaustion now...

subtitles.original: もうずっと歌ってますからね
subtitles.english: Well, we've been singing this whole time.

subtitles.original: 駆け抜けて... きたけど、どう？
subtitles.english: We've dashed through... but how was it?

subtitles.original: 早いようで長かっただ
subtitles.english: It felt fast, but also long.

subtitles.original: 薄い！
subtitles.english: Weak!

subtitles.original: ねぇ、色々ね 何今日のテンション何なんだよマジで
subtitles.english: Right, lots of things... seriously, what is with this energy today?

subtitles.original: いやーまあ楽しかったんですよ、今日 めちゃくちゃルイ姉と一緒に踊れてよかったんだね
subtitles.english: Well, it's just been so fun today. I'm so glad I could dance with you, Lui-nee.

subtitles.original: だって初めてだよ！
subtitles.english: Because it's the first time!

subtitles.original: そう、そうそうそう しかもホロックスでなんか我輩だけ呼んでくれたってことは なんか...
subtitles.english: Right, right, right. And the fact that you called only me from HoloX must mean...

subtitles.original: そう、なんか今日は 2周年は ツートップね、あの、ホロックスのツートップ まあ、総帥と幹部で歌って踊りたいなっていうことで お呼びさせていただきました
subtitles.english: Yeah, so for today, for the 2nd anniversary, I wanted the two leaders of HoloX, the Leader and Executive, to sing and dance together, which is why I invited you.

subtitles.original: いい夫婦
subtitles.english: A good couple.

subtitles.original: 何？今日テンション高いな！
subtitles.english: What? You're so high energy today!

subtitles.original: そうだよ 嬉しくて体で表してるの いや、めっちゃおめでとう！
subtitles.english: That's right! I'm expressing my joy through my body. Seriously, big congrats!

subtitles.original: いや、2周年さ、色々あったじゃん お互いさ
subtitles.english: Well, lots of things happened over these two years, for both of us.

subtitles.original: ありました、とってもありました
subtitles.english: There certainly were, very much so.

subtitles.original: なんか あの、重要な時は会話したりとかしてたけど まあ、いつもこう静かにお互い見守って
subtitles.english: We'd talk during important times, but usually, we just quietly watched over each other.

subtitles.original: まあ、なんかやばそうだなと思ったら声かけてみたいなことを... 「大丈夫？」みたいなね
subtitles.english: And if it looked like things were getting rough, we'd reach out... like saying "Are you okay?"

subtitles.original: そうそうそうそう やってきましたね、ここまで
subtitles.english: Exactly. That's how we've made it this far.

subtitles.original: やってき、やっぱ応援してもらったし いっぱい応援してもらった、いっぱい応援して 頑張ろうみたいな
subtitles.english: We made it, and we were supported by everyone. We got so much support, so let's keep doing our best.

subtitles.original: 頑張ろうね これからもさ
subtitles.english: Let's keep going. From here on out, too.
